section.title: Planned Orders by Item
section.para: To view Planned Orders by Item, select the "Planned Orders by Item" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: When a Planned Work Order is released, the Create Work Order screen will appear with Work Order details automatically filled in. Releasing a Planned Purchase Order results in a Purchase Request, which may in turn be released from the Purchase Request reports.

section.para: When displaying Planned Orders by Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item whose Planned Orders you want to display. The browse button located to the right of the field leads to a searchable list of make and buy items.

note.para: In the case of Planned Purchase Orders, the quantity will always be represented in the Inventory Unit of Measure (UOM)â€”regardless of the Vendor UOM used on any existing Purchase Orders.

listitem.para: Select to display Planned Orders by Item for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Planned Orders by Item you want to display.
Display will show Planned Orders by Item, using the specified parameters. Firm Planned Orders will display in blue.

tip.para: Planned Orders must be firm before they will be considered as a valid source of supply by Material Requirements Planning (MRP) when MRP is run.
